message: Let's be fair and take the biggest share for myself
My turn! Let's be reasonable. This is a good deal for both of us before inflation eats into it.
I'll take a bit less, but still more than half. Don't wait for inflation to make it worthless!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Any more rounds and inflation will just hurt us both.
